title: ICE using Palantir tool that feeds on Medicaid data
summary:
The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) has revealed that its warnings about the federal government using consolidated data, including Medicaid information, for immigration enforcement have become a reality. EFF had previously sought to block the use of Medicaid data for deportations and cautioned against the Trump administration's plan to integrate government information into a single, AI-driven interface via Palantir, a company with a questionable privacy record.

New evidence, reported by 404 Media, confirms Palantir is developing a tool for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) called Enhanced Leads Identification & Targeting for Enforcement (ELITE). This tool generates a map of potential deportation targets, provides personal dossiers, and offers "confidence scores" for addresses. Significantly, ELITE receives address data from the Department of Health and Human Services (which oversees Medicaid) and other sources, as confirmed by court testimony.

This revelation coincides with ICE's "surveillance technology shopping spree," including a heavy presence in Minneapolis. The article highlights the danger of government agencies pooling data collected for specific purposes (like healthcare or taxes) and repurposing it for unrelated enforcement, calling it a vast expansion of government power susceptible to abuse, akin to the "Total Information Awareness" program.

EFF has actively fought these practices through lawsuits and amicus briefs, challenging ICE's access to Medicaid and taxpayer data, and a program monitoring noncitizens' speech. However, EFF stresses that litigation is not enough, urging public outcry and immediate Congressional intervention to protect privacy and security.
chinese_title: 移民和海关执法局使用Palantir工具获取医疗补助数据。
chinese_summary:
电子前沿基金会（EFF）透露，其关于联邦政府将整合数据（包括医疗补助信息）用于移民执法的警告已成为现实。EFF此前曾试图阻止将医疗补助数据用于遣返，并警告特朗普政府计划通过Palantir（一家隐私记录堪忧的公司）将政府信息整合到一个由人工智能驱动的单一界面中。

据404 Media报道的新证据证实，Palantir正在为移民和海关执法局（ICE）开发一款名为“增强线索识别与执法目标（ELITE）”的工具。该工具能生成潜在遣返目标的地图、提供个人档案并给出地址的“置信度评分”。值得注意的是，ELITE从卫生与公众服务部（负责监管医疗补助）及其他来源接收地址数据，这一点已通过法庭证词证实。

这一披露正值ICE的“监控技术采购狂潮”，其中包括在明尼阿波利斯的大量部署。文章强调了政府机构汇集为特定目的（如医疗保健或税务）收集的数据，并将其重新用于不相关执法的危险性，称其为政府权力的巨大扩张，极易被滥用，类似于“全面信息感知”计划。

EFF已通过诉讼和法庭之友简报积极对抗这些做法，挑战ICE获取医疗补助和纳税人数据的权限，以及一项监控非公民言论的计划。然而，EFF强调诉讼不足以解决问题，敦促公众强烈抗议并立即进行国会干预，以保护隐私和安全。

title: First, make me care
summary:
This article provides writing advice for nonfiction authors, stressing the importance of immediate reader engagement. It highlights a common failure: opening with extensive background information, which causes readers to lose interest and disengage before reaching the core material.

The key recommendation is to identify and lead with a "hook"—the single most interesting anomaly or compelling question related to the topic. This approach aims to immediately capture attention and make readers care. Background information should only follow once this initial engagement has been secured. The central principle is to earn the reader's attention first.
chinese_title: 首先，让我在乎。
chinese_summary:
本文为非虚构类作者提供写作建议，强调立即吸引读者关注的重要性。文章指出一个常见错误：开篇即提供大量背景信息，导致读者在接触核心内容之前便失去兴趣并脱离。

核心建议是，找出与主题相关的“钩子”——一个最有趣的异常现象或引人入胜的问题——并以此开篇。这种做法旨在立即吸引注意力，让读者关心。只有在初步的关注被确保之后，背景信息才应跟进。核心原则是：首先赢得读者的注意力。

title: BirdyChat becomes first European chat app that is interoperable with WhatsApp
summary:
On November 14, 2025, BirdyChat announced it has become the first European chat app to achieve interoperability with WhatsApp under the Digital Markets Act (DMA). This milestone allows BirdyChat users to exchange messages with WhatsApp users, furthering BirdyChat's mission to host work conversations.

Previously, users could only message those already on BirdyChat, hindering adoption. Now, any BirdyChat user in the European Economic Area (EEA) can initiate a 1:1 chat with a WhatsApp user in the region using their phone number, removing this significant barrier. This enables BirdyChat users to keep work conversations organized while staying connected to WhatsApp contacts.

The interoperability supports sending messages, photos, and files over an end-to-end encrypted connection. BirdyChat users can also use their work email as their identity, separating work and personal communications. The integration utilizes WhatsApp's official Third-Party Chats interface.

Currently, only 1:1 chats are supported, with group chat interoperability planned for a future update. The feature will roll out gradually across the EEA, requiring both BirdyChat and WhatsApp users to be in the region. BirdyChat is invite-only, and users can join a waitlist for early access to this functionality.
chinese_title: BirdyChat 成为第一个能与 WhatsApp 互联互通的欧洲聊天应用
chinese_summary:
2025年11月14日，BirdyChat宣布已成为首个在《数字市场法案》(DMA)下实现与WhatsApp互操作性的欧洲聊天应用。这一里程碑允许BirdyChat用户与WhatsApp用户交换消息，进一步推动BirdyChat承载工作沟通的使命。

此前，用户只能向BirdyChat上的现有用户发送消息，这阻碍了其普及。现在，任何欧洲经济区(EEA)内的BirdyChat用户都可以使用电话号码与该区域的WhatsApp用户发起一对一聊天，从而消除了这一重大障碍。这使得BirdyChat用户在与WhatsApp联系人保持连接的同时，也能保持工作沟通井然有序。

该互操作性支持通过端到端加密连接发送消息、照片和文件。BirdyChat用户还可以使用他们的工作邮箱作为身份标识，分离工作与个人沟通。此集成利用了WhatsApp官方的第三方聊天界面。

目前，仅支持一对一聊天，群聊互通功能计划在未来的更新中推出。该功能将在EEA逐步推出，要求BirdyChat和WhatsApp用户都位于该区域。BirdyChat实行邀请制，用户可以加入候补名单以抢先体验此功能。

title: A macOS app that blurs your screen when you slouch
summary:
Posturr is a macOS application that encourages better posture by progressively blurring your screen when it detects you're slouching. It leverages your Mac's camera and Apple's Vision framework to monitor your body pose and face in real-time. The screen blur intensifies with worse posture and clears instantly when you sit up straight.

Key features include real-time posture detection, a gentle visual reminder, multi-display support, and easy access to settings via a menu bar icon. Users can recalibrate their baseline posture, adjust detection sensitivity and dead zone, and toggle optional Dock visibility.

Privacy is a core focus: all processing happens locally on your Mac, ensuring no data or images are stored or transmitted externally. The app is lightweight, requires no account, and runs as a background process.

Installation is recommended via Homebrew (`brew install --cask posturr`) or by manual download. Posturr requires camera access, which macOS prompts for upon first launch. For best results, ensure adequate lighting, position your camera at eye level, and keep your upper body visible. The app uses macOS's CoreGraphics API for efficient blur, with an NSVisualEffectView fallback available. It's compatible with macOS 13.0 (Ventura) or later.
chinese_title: 当你驼背时模糊屏幕的 macOS 应用
chinese_summary:
Posturr 是一款 macOS 应用，当它检测到你姿势不佳时，会通过逐渐模糊屏幕来鼓励你保持良好姿势。它利用 Mac 的摄像头和 Apple 的 Vision 框架，实时监测你的身体姿势和面部。屏幕模糊程度会随着姿势恶化而加剧，当你坐直时则立即恢复清晰。

主要功能包括实时姿势检测、温和的视觉提醒、多显示器支持，以及通过菜单栏图标轻松访问设置。用户可以重新校准其基准姿势，调整检测灵敏度和“死区”，并切换可选的 Dock 可见性。

隐私是核心关注点：所有处理都在你的 Mac 上本地进行，确保不存储或外部传输任何数据或图像。该应用轻量级，无需账户，并作为后台进程运行。

建议通过 Homebrew (`brew install --cask posturr`) 或手动下载进行安装。Posturr 需要摄像头访问权限，macOS 会在首次启动时提示。为获得最佳效果，请确保光线充足，将摄像头放置在与眼睛齐平的位置，并保持上半身可见。该应用使用 macOS 的 CoreGraphics API 进行高效模糊处理，并提供 NSVisualEffectView 作为备用方案。它兼容 macOS 13.0 (Ventura) 或更高版本。

title: Deutsche Telekom is throttling the internet
summary:
Deutsche Telekom is accused of throttling internet speeds, leading Epicenter.works, the Society for Civil Rights, the Federation of German Consumer Organizations, and Professor Barbara van Schewick to file an official complaint with the Federal Network Agency. The complaint alleges Telekom creates artificial bottlenecks, allowing paying services faster access while others are intentionally slowed or blocked, violating net neutrality.

Numerous customer testimonials support these claims, reporting severe internet performance issues. Users describe slow loading times, high packet loss, and services becoming unusable, particularly during peak hours (evenings, weekends). Affected platforms include Cloudflare-backed sites, Google services (YouTube), Reddit, Discord, GitHub, Steam, Activision/Blizzard, public broadcasters' media libraries, ChatGPT, Notion, online gaming, and academic/research portals. Many customers state that using a VPN instantly resolves these problems, strongly suggesting an issue with Telekom's peering or routing practices. Some users have resorted to using mobile data from other providers or are considering switching ISPs due to the persistent problems, which have reportedly lasted for months or even years. Downloads, streaming, and even basic website access are severely impacted, hindering both personal and professional use.
chinese_title: 德国电信正在对互联网限速
chinese_summary:
德国电信被指控限制互联网速度，导致Epicenter.works、公民权利协会、德国消费者组织联合会和Barbara van Schewick教授向联邦网络局提交了正式投诉。投诉声称，德国电信制造人为瓶颈，允许付费服务获得更快的访问速度，而其他服务则被故意减慢或阻止，这违反了网络中立性原则。

大量客户证词支持这些说法，报告了严重的互联网性能问题。用户描述了加载时间慢、高丢包率，以及服务变得无法使用，尤其是在高峰时段（晚上、周末）。受影响的平台包括Cloudflare支持的网站、谷歌服务（YouTube）、Reddit、Discord、GitHub、Steam、动视暴雪、公共广播公司的媒体库、ChatGPT、Notion、在线游戏以及学术/研究门户网站。许多客户表示，使用VPN可以立即解决这些问题，这强烈暗示德国电信的对等互联或路由实践存在问题。一些用户已转而使用其他提供商的移动数据，或正在考虑更换互联网服务提供商（ISP），因为这些持续存在的问题据称已持续数月甚至数年。下载、流媒体甚至基本的网站访问都受到严重影响，妨碍了个人和专业用途。

title: Adoption of EVs tied to real-world reductions in air pollution: study
summary:
A new study by Keck School of Medicine of USC researchers provides the first statistically significant evidence that the adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) is linked to real-world reductions in air pollution. Published in The Lancet Planetary Health, the study utilized high-resolution satellite data to track nitrogen dioxide (NO₂) levels across 1,692 California neighborhoods between 2019 and 2023, correlating it with zero-emissions vehicle (ZEV) registration data.

The findings revealed that for every 200 ZEVs added to a neighborhood, NO₂ levels dropped by 1.1%. This confirms earlier research and substantiates the immediate environmental health benefits of EVs. NO₂, a harmful pollutant from burning fossil fuels, can trigger asthma, bronchitis, and increase the risk of heart disease and stroke.

Senior author Erika Garcia highlighted the immediate health impact of improved air quality, while lead author Sandrah Eckel noted that California's transition to EVs, even with ZEVs making up only 2% to 5% of light-duty vehicles during the study, is already making a measurable difference. Researchers validated their findings by accounting for factors like the pandemic, gas prices, and work-from-home patterns. The study supports continued EV adoption and demonstrates the utility of satellite data for tracking environmental interventions. The team plans to next investigate the link between ZEV adoption and asthma-related hospitalizations.
chinese_title: 研究：电动汽车普及与空气污染实际减少相关
chinese_summary:
南加州大学凯克医学院研究人员的一项新研究首次提供了具有统计学意义的证据，表明电动汽车（EV）的普及与实际空气污染的减少有关。该研究发表在《柳叶刀·星球健康》上，利用高分辨率卫星数据追踪了2019年至2023年间加州1,692个社区的二氧化氮（NO₂）水平，并将其与零排放汽车（ZEV）的注册数据进行了关联分析。

研究结果显示，每当一个社区增加200辆ZEV，二氧化氮水平就下降1.1%。这证实了早期的研究，并证实了电动汽车对环境健康的即时益处。二氧化氮是一种燃烧化石燃料产生的有害污染物，可引发哮喘、支气管炎，并增加患心脏病和中风的风险。

资深作者Erika Garcia强调了空气质量改善对健康的即时影响，而主要作者Sandrah Eckel指出，即使在研究期间ZEV仅占轻型车辆的2%到5%，加州向电动汽车的转型也已经产生了可衡量的影响。研究人员通过考虑疫情、汽油价格和居家办公模式等因素，验证了他们的发现。该研究支持继续推广电动汽车，并证明了卫星数据在追踪环境干预措施方面的实用性。该团队计划接下来调查ZEV普及与哮喘相关住院之间的联系。
